name: Wind Turbine Simulator
description:
Want to relax and do nothing?

In Wind Turbine Simulator you are you watch as wind turbines spin while clouds come overhead. That's right no user input required. It just works. With you favorite music app you can also enjoy some calm music to the movement of the turbines.

Avalible for Windows

Mac 

Linux 

Android 4.1+

A future update will bring day and night cycles.
